tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Ashish Taneja is an exceptional orthopedic surgeon and I highly recommend him to anyone in need of knee replacement or other orthopedic care. He recently performed a total knee replacement surgery on my mother at Venkateswar Hospital (Sector 18, Dwarka) and the entire experience was excellent.

Dr. Taneja is not only a skilled and experienced surgeon, but he is also incredibly kind, warm, and friendly. He took the time to thoroughly explain the procedure to my mother and our family, answering all of our questions patiently. His bedside manner is truly outstanding.

The coordinator, Kalpana, was also incredibly helpful and guided us every step of the way throughout the surgery and recovery process. She was very polite and responsive to our needs and concerns.

The surgery itself was a complete success, and my mother is now recovering well thanks to Dr. Taneja's expertise. We are so grateful for the care and attention he provided.

I cannot recommend Dr. Ashish Taneja highly enough. If you are in need of an orthopedic surgeon in India, look no further than Dr. Taneja. He is truly one of the best doctors in the country.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a left elbow radial head fracture and I took treatment/surgery with Dr Ashish Taneja Sir for the same.

He explained and addressed all queries to the point logically, his caring & professional behaviour reflects from first meeting, I was worrying about the outcome and Sir confirmed he will give his best and that really gave a lot of comfort and it tells me that he is a good doctor who cares about results, for patient wellbeing and better future life and advised to stay positive and ignore the 1% part where things will go negative., it increased my confidence and trust in him, and as promised he did perfect operation.. 

On the basis of my treatment in my opinion, he is one of the best ortho surgeon, a good and friendly person, compassionate & brilliant doctor who posses excellent knowledege, and also have rich experience of more than 18 years, more than that he operates many patients per week.

I can‚Äôt thank him enough and words are short to express my gratitude. his personal touch and willingness to go beyond & offer best treatment are rare traits.

I will definitely recommend him to anyone who is having ortho issues of any kind.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I being an  anxiety patient  and visually impaired was treated with utmost care  and the problem was explained and cured . And I am thankful to the doctor for his great help extended to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: An absolute friendly,down to earth,caring ,responsive ,well I think I would run out of adjectives here .My father was suffering from a knee pain from last 15 yrs and hence we travelled to almost three states to see a doctors which were recommended by few of my contacts and fortunately I thank almighty I didn‚Äôt agreed with their procedure .Three weeks ago I had a video consulating with Mr Ashish Taneja and finally the very next day we went for a perosonal consultation,and it didn‚Äôt took us a minute to nod our head to yes for the surgery .Let me tell you something about this finest doctor I have ever encountered,he would operate and he himself would do the dressing .I mean I have always seen a doctor assistant to do the secondary part .My experience he wouldn‚Äôt take a minor chance be that of infection or the surgery.It‚Äôs the third week and my dad is recovery absolutely fast  ,walker has gone away along with the medicine .I thank you for all your support and kindness doctor and I wish you a very best for your future **** *** ****** *** ** *** ********* ****** *********** * **** **** *** *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to THANK Dr. Ashish Taneja (Ortho Surgeon) for the **** treatment of my mother. My mother slipped a few days ago and got an injury in her right shoulder, due to which she was unable to lift her hand up without support. After getting her MRI done, we came to know that there is a tendon tear/rotator cuff tear in her right shoulder. Someone in the family referred to consult Dr. Ashish. We visited him at Delhi Bone & Joint Clinic in Janak Puri. He suggested that the only solution for this is a Rotator cuff repair surgery. Dr. Ashish planned the complete surgery and was in connect with us throughout the period. The best thing about Dr. Ashish is that he always reverts to messages on time and keeps himself connected with the patient/attendant as a family member. This gives a lot of confidence and faith to the patient that he/she is in the right hands. We are extremely satisfied with Dr. Ashish's treatment, surgery and advices he has given for the post surgery recovery. I highly recommend him, he is a great surgeon.¬†üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Reconstruction and Rehabilitation,Fracture Treatment,Bone Trauma,Orthopedic physical therapy,Reconstruction and Bone Lengthening,
review: My leg was damaged to an extent where I thought it would not look and feel the same. Both my bones in lower right leg broke and overlapped. It has been one year and I'm back to travelling alone, wearing heels, running and doing every other activity involving my leg. It doesn't feel any different than my left leg, in fact better. I don't think any other doctor would be able to help me better while going through the whole treatment. I was on complete bed rest and from that to running again was a smooth sail.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
****VISITED FOR ACL SURGERY**** ** ****** ****** ** * **** ********** ******* ** ****** He is an *****AMAZING DR*****.I met him when my acl completely tore by fallen my scooty. I am very happy and so thankful to Taneja sir. He guided all the things very clearly pre n post surgery. He used to listen all my issues very patienly. If by any chance, i wanted to ask something and sir was busy, he notably resolved my query thru text within FEW MINUTES of asking. 
I'm really glad,and lot of thanks to sir, he gave me the best treatment i could think of, really satisfactory reasults. 
If you're looking for orthopedic surgeon in delhi, I'd highly recommend you to contact this brilliant, calm and really friendly doctor, Dr. Taneja sir. 
Once again, my sincere gratitude to sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited him when I had Gamekeeper's Thumb (Ligament teared off the bone with a chip) while playing Cricket.
 
Dr. Aashish Taneja is extremely kind and compassionate. Explains everything in detail and does an expert job. 

Further, he is a kind-hearted soul as well which is a rarity these days. He went beyond his professional obligations and ensured that I got dropped back to home after treatment (It was lock-down period and I was all alone). 

Highly highly recommended for both his expertise and kindness.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Was suffering from lower back pain and after googling about Dr. Ashish Taneja, I visited his clinic Delhi Bone & Joint Clinic, Janakpuri and consulted with him regarding the pain. His gesture regarding my anxiety due to pain was commendable and he listened to my each n every points and then started the treatment and after 15 days I‚Äôm now feeling much better than before. Hoping that I will be fine very soon! Add-on is that he suggested all the precautions very precisely what I have to keep in my mind to take care of my back!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr. Aashish after unsatisfactory consultation with another top doctor from Delhi. 
Our consultation with the previous doctor did not help with my sister's recurring knee problem, so we decided to change doctor.

Dr. Aashish patiently listened to the problem, asked many questions like family history and daily life routine.
He did not jump to conclusive treatment but waited for test results and assessed other factors before diagnosing the problem.

Prescribed medicines are now showing positive results.

I can highly recommend Dr. Aashish, if you are looking for a doctor who gives time and patiently listens to your problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Ashish gave me ample time to speak about the issues I am facing. However incoherent I sounded, he patiently heard me out, questioned where necessary and gave me extensive answers . It helped me gain clarity and gave me some respite which was missing since long. Also, he helped me chart out a future course of action with proper follow ups and no overloading of medications and tests.
His approach of empathy and making every aspect of my narrative important helped me also put things into the right perspective.  It goes a long way in building a bond with a doctor , a person ,you know, you are entrusting your life or the life of your loved ones with.
The straight forward, simplistic yet thoroughly professional approach is what sets Dr. Ashish apart.
Thank you for making a difference with love ,joy ,patience and above all with the insights which help a person trust you and the prescribed treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ****** ** *** **** * **** ******* ****** *** amazing surgeon but at the same time he is very friendly as well towards his patients. He operated on my mother for hip fracture and during the entire course of hospitalization, Dr Ashish made himself available on call and visited her many times...which made this entire process so much more comfortable and provided lot of confidence to her for a speedy recovery at this age of 68 yrs.

With immense gratitude, I wish Dr Taneja lots of success in his profession!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
While playing cricket two weeks ago, I got injured on 16th November 2019. It was very painful incident, when I was not even able stand on my own after injury.
My colleague's refered me to Max Gurgaon where Dr. Ashish Taneja examine my condition and detected displaced fracture in right leg/ankle.

Doctor after diagnosis immediately recommend for surgery, after successful completion of surgery,  I got discharge from the hospital in very short time. 

Dr. Ashish is excellent at his work and  genuinely a kind, supportive and trust worthy doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** ****** ** *** ** *** ****** ********** ******** ** *** ****** He is highly competent, extremely attentive, very detailed and takes an extraordinary attention in diagnosis, treatment, surgery and post op that you may need.  There is never a time you can ever feel that he is not deeply concerned about your health, wellness and comfort.  These are rare qualities to find in ****** ******* *** experienced doctors who have the pressure of  multiple activities and patients. We could not have asked for a better Orthopedic surgeon and would highly recommend Dr Taneja. Even if you do choose someone else and have the time and inclination for a second opinion , do meet him.  You will get a very precise and high quality diagnosis with every possible option for treatment laid out with a recommendation on the most favorable way to go. For a Hip Replacement surgery , in our case his work was outstanding and we could not have asked for a better result . Highly recommended.
